title: 【歐洲失守】  奧地利 克羅地亞 瑞士 相繼失守

replies.msg:
Coronavirus spreads through Europe from Italy to Austria, Croatia and Tenerife
The contagion remains concentrated in northern Italy, with 212 cases in Lombardy – the region from which it has spread to other European countries
Talks between the health ministers of Austria, France, Slovenia, Switzerland, Germany, Croatia and Italy are set for Tuesday to coordinate a response

New cases of the novel coronavirus were confirmed on Tuesday throughout Italy as well as in Austria, Croatia and Tenerife, hours before a meeting of European health ministers was due to take place. The total number of cases in Italy has risen to 283, up 54 from Monday evening, Civil Protection Agency chief Angelo Borrelli said. This count includes seven people who died and one patient in Rome who has recovered from the Covid-19 disease caused by the virus and was dismissed from hospital on Saturday. For the first time, cases have been reported in Tuscany – two – and South Tyrol and Sicily – one in each region
無知一問...奧地利有禁蒙面法, 而家佢地係咪依然唔戴得口罩?
